optionsEnableQuickAddHelp.message: "Quick add task" is a right-click menu item that can quickly add the selected content to the specified task list

optionsQuickAddTasklistHelp.message: When using "Quick add task", the task will be added to the selected task list

optionsQuickAddTitleSelection.message: Use selected content as task title

optionsQuickAddTitleTabTitle.message: Use the title of the current page as the task title

optionsQuickAddTitleHelp.message: When using "Quick add task", the selected content will be used as the task title, the title longer than 130 characters will be omitted with ...

optionsEnableAutoResetHelp.message: After the task is successfully created, the content of the current form is automatically reset, which is suitable for scenarios where multiple tasks are created continuously
